entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
